name: JumpingBall
description:
Jumping games is probably the most common theme when it comes to make ball jumping games. Itch.io App Store is full of arcade ball jumping games but it's still hard to find a good free jumping game for Android to live the real adventure with it, Isn't it string!

But it's not the case for you today, Welcome to "JumpingBall", so be ready for a jumpy ball game experience. Jump games has a classic in arcade jumping game-play, with stunning and clean graphics and sounds.

Why are you still reading this and wasting your time. It's time to stop reading and start downloading this free jumping ball adventure. Oh you want some more details about it? Here you go then!

How to Play JumpingBall:

It's simple to play but hard to master, you have to be a good player to master it. Touch the left and right sides and hold the screen to move. That's all. Try to avoid anything red, break blue lines for more points, and remember, dark grey bars don't move, blue bars move, and yellow bars fall.

Feature of JumpingBall:

  • Amazing and clean graphics
  • Simple and user friendly controls
  • Clean and hight quality sounds
  • Optimized for all Android devices including tabs
  • Google Plus sign in and leaderboard available

    • So are you ready to hit the game and live the adventure?

    It's a perfect and a must have jumping ball game if you are bored with playing regular jumping games. Just download JumpingBall and start your own adventure. Have fun !
